Description:
Storeman - RiyadhFunctional DescriptionThe Storeman will be primarily responsible for managing the stockyard operations and exercising control of receipts, issues, and storage of fuel and cars. Major Duties and ResponsibilitiesSupervise the loading and/or unloading of Parts  
Assign the stock number of all newly received Parts. 
Ensure that all newly received Parts are stored appropriately and in a secure manner.
Release Parts to the salesman. 
Arrange the dispatching to the required location according to the transfer request. Skills
Skills: Basic Education or Diploma in an appropriate field

Minimum One Year of experience in the same post.  
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.  
Good written and verbal communication skills in Arabic and English. 
Good Computer skills.
